profile:
Call today to Just Get it Done! 1-800-GOT-JUNK? is a full-service junk removal company operating our junk hauling franchise in Toronto and G.T.A. since 1999.  1800GOTJUNK  will remove almost any junk, trash, or waste from old furniture and appliances to garden waste, electronics, and renovation debris.   gotjunk

1-800-GOT-JUNK? is proud and thankful to have earned the recommendations of so many of our customers.

services:
Household Junk Removal: Appliance Removal, Refrigerator Removal, Mattress Removal, Furniture Removal, Carpet removal, TV Removal, Tire Removal, Hot Tub Removal, Scrap Metal Removal
 
Office Junk Removal: Computer Recycling, Printer Recycling, Monitor recycling
 
General Junk Removal: Leaf Removal, Rubbish Removal, Garbage Removal Alternative, Dumpster Alternative, Trash Removal Alternative, Construction Cleanout, Estate Cleanout
specialities:
Recycling and Donating

We make every effort possible to recycle or donate furniture, household items, scrap metal and all kinds of different junk that we remove from homes and businesses. We work with Toronto charities and recycling centers in the GTA to reuse and recycle the junk we haul away before we take items to the landfill.

profile: Like It Or Dump It prides itself on providing quality work at a great price. We provide a variety of Junk Removal services, ranging from same day removal to flexible bin deliveries and pickups.  Whether you're a homeowner who needs help decluttering or a contractor who needs a big project cleaned up, we have got you covered, with safe and proper solutions. We value every customer tremendously, which is why we make sure the whole process is executed smoothly, with strong communication, honesty and quality. Our goal is to create a great start to finish experience, and furthermore build great relationships with our customers, so that when you pick up the phone to call us you can rest assured the job will get done correctly.

profile:
Demolition for you is a company with well-trained employees, we have worked all over the GTA and over with references and photos of what we have done for the past 7 years of being in business. 
We do commercial and residential demolitions. 

We have a strong team with a lot of experience. the reason why we are the best candidate to do your demolition because we love what we do and experience, so we know exactly what needs done and we also provide high quality of protection and care for any area that need to be protected and demolish. 

We do all entire house demolition • Garage & shed demolition • Flooring demolition • Bathroom demolition • Basement demolition Partition wall deconstruction • Kitchen demolition • Furniture dismantling • Commercial unit demolition • Warehouse demolition • Roof demolition furniture dismantle or to garbage, walls to carefully tear down, 

We commit to take care of all garbage and unwanted items after any process are completed in a short time and without any disruption to our customers.

You can check some of our reviews, Instagram page to see some of our previous projects.

Give us a call - 647-686-7220
